pr_title: Keep constructors for Decimal128 and ObjectId

timeline.message: Keep constructors for Decimal128 and ObjectId

timeline.bodyText: This also keeps the class name itself, right?
timeline.author: cmelchior
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,5 +22,9 @@
 -dontnote rx.Observable
 
 # Referenced from JNI
--keep class org.bson.types.Decimal128
--keep class org.bson.types.ObjectId
\ No newline at end of file
+-keep class org.bson.types.Decimal128 {

replies.bodyText: Yes, it initially kept just the class name. With this PR we protect the constructors called from JNI.
replies.author: clementetb
